<analysis>

**Current Session - User Message 1:**
The user shared screenshots of the "Nosotros" page in dark mode and said: "vamos a hacer mejoras en el dark mode en especial en el color de las letras y por ejemplo en el color de los iconos"

**My approach:**
1. Read all relevant files: dark-mode.css, nosotros.astro, global.css, index.astro, Footer.astro, HeroSection.astro, CategoryCard.astro, ProductCard.astro, faq.astro, FAQ.astro, Breadcrumb.astro, product-card.css, [slug].astro

2. Identified issues:

   - Secondary text used `#94a3b8` everywhere - too dim
   - FAQ.astro had broken dark mode using `var(--color-gray-100)` which inverts to `#334155` (dark text on dark bg)
   - faq.astro CTA had same bug

3. Made edits across 15+ files:
   - nosotros.astro: Added icon dark mode overrides (.value-icon, .contact-icon → `#60a5fa`), brightened founder description, added value-card/contact-card text overrides, cleaned up duplicate rules
   - dark-mode.css: section-subtitle `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`
   - index.astro: feature-description and trust-text span `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`
   - CategoryCard.astro: category-description/count `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`
   - product-card.css: product-description and app-tag `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`
   - FAQ.astro: Fixed broken vars to hardcoded hex (`#f1f5f9`, `#e2e8f0`, `#b0bec5`)
   - faq.astro: Fixed CTA box broken vars
   - [slug].astro: detail-app-tag and trust-card-text span
   - ProductFilter.module.css: subcategory-btn and sort-label
   - QuoteItems.module.css: quote-empty text
   - cotizacion.astro, cotizacion-enviada.astro, 404.astro, InstallPrompt.astro

4. Build verified: 66 pages, 0 errors

**User Message 2:**
User shared more screenshots showing remaining dark mode issues and said: "aun hay problemas de colores, por ejemplo el varianteselector no se ve bien en dark mode"

Screenshots showed:
- BTT-001 product detail with VariantSelector having dim/invisible text
- Model cards with wrong contrast
- Variant labels barely visible

**My approach (in plan mode):**
1. Explored VariantSelector.module.css - found ~30 broken dark mode rules
2. Root cause: Same bug as FAQ - using CSS variables that invert in dark mode
   - `var(--color-gray-200)` for TEXT → resolves to `#475569` (dark!) instead of light
   - `var(--color-gray-800)` for BACKGROUNDS → resolves to `#f8fafc` (white!) instead of dark
3. Read the full CSS module (855 lines) and mapped every broken rule
4. Created a detailed plan with specific corrections for:
   - ~13 text color fixes
   - ~8 background fixes
   - ~8 border fixes
5. Wrote plan to plan file, ready to exit plan mode

The plan was written but ExitPlanMode was NOT called yet - that's where we left off.

<summary>
1. Primary Request and Intent:

   **Request 1 (completed):** "vamos a hacer mejoras en el dark mode en especial en el color de las letras y por ejemplo en el color de los iconos" — User wanted dark mode improvements across the site, specifically text colors and icon colors. They shared screenshots of the Nosotros page showing poor contrast.

   **Request 2 (in progress):** "aun hay problemas de colores, por ejemplo el varianteselector no se ve bien en dark mode" — After the initial fixes, user showed screenshots of the BTT-001 product page where the VariantSelector component has broken dark mode (dim/invisible text, wrong backgrounds, poor contrast on model cards and variant labels).

2. Key Technical Concepts:
   - **CSS Variable Inversion System:** The site uses a dark mode system where CSS variables in `[data-theme="dark"]` get inverted values. `--color-gray-50` (lightest in light) becomes `#1e293b` (darkest in dark), and `--color-gray-900` (darkest in light) becomes `#ffffff` (lightest in dark).
   - **Critical Bug Pattern:** Many dark mode override rules use `var(--color-gray-N)` which ALSO invert, causing text to use background-level colors and vice versa. For example, `:global([data-theme="dark"]) .label { color: var(--color-gray-200); }` resolves to `#475569` (dark) instead of a light text color.
   - **Fix Pattern:** Replace CSS variable references in dark mode overrides with hardcoded hex values following this palette:
     - Backgrounds: `#0f172a`, `#1e293b`, `#334155`
     - Borders: `#475569`, `#64748b`
     - Primary text: `#f1f5f9`, `#e2e8f0`
     - Secondary text: `#b0bec5` (replaces `#94a3b8`)
     - Muted text: `#94a3b8` (for SKUs, stock indicators)
     - Icons: `#60a5fa` with `rgba(96, 165, 250, 0.12-0.22)` backgrounds
   - **Astro CSS Modules:** Components use `:global([data-theme="dark"]) .className` for dark mode in scoped styles
   - **Astro SSG with Preact islands:** VariantSelector is a Preact island with CSS modules

3. Files and Code Sections:

   **Already Modified (Request 1 — completed):**

   - **`src/styles/dark-mode.css`** — Global dark mode overrides
     - Changed `.section-subtitle` from `#94a3b8` to `#b0bec5`
     - Dark mode variable definitions at top (reference): gray-50 through gray-900 inverted scale

   - **`src/pages/nosotros.astro`** — Nosotros page
     - Added dark mode for `.value-icon`: `background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(96, 165, 250, 0.12) 0%, rgba(96, 165, 250, 0.22) 100%); color: #60a5fa;`
     - Added dark mode for `.contact-icon`: same treatment
     - Added `.value-card h3 { color: #f1f5f9; }`, `.value-card p { color: #b0bec5; }`
     - Added `.contact-card h3 { color: #f1f5f9; }`, `.contact-card p { color: #b0bec5; }`
     - Brightened `.founder-description` from `#94a3b8` to `#cbd5e1`
     - Removed duplicate `.page-hero-title` and `.cta-title` rules

   - **`src/pages/index.astro`** — Home page
     - `.feature-description`: `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`
     - `.trust-text span`: `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`

   - **`src/components/CategoryCard.astro`** — Category cards
     - `.category-description, .category-count`: `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`

   - **`src/styles/product-card.css`** — Product card shared styles
     - `.product-description`: `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`
     - `.app-tag color`: `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`

   - **`src/components/FAQ.astro`** — FAQ accordion component (BUG FIX)
     - `.faq-title`: `var(--color-gray-100)` (resolved to `#334155` — invisible!) → `#f1f5f9`
     - `.faq-question`: `var(--color-gray-200)` (resolved to `#475569`) → `#e2e8f0`
     - `.faq-answer`: `var(--color-gray-400)` → `#b0bec5`
     - Added `.faq-icon { color: #64748b; }`

   - **`src/pages/faq.astro`** — FAQ page (BUG FIX)
     - `.cta-box h3`: `var(--color-gray-100)` → `#f1f5f9`
     - `.cta-box p`: `var(--color-gray-400)` → `#b0bec5`

   - **`src/pages/productos/[slug].astro`** — Product detail page
     - `.detail-app-tag`: `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`
     - `.trust-card-text span`: `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`

   - **`src/components/islands/ProductFilter.module.css`** — Product filter
     - `.subcategory-btn`: `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`
     - `.sort-label`: `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`

   - **`src/components/islands/QuoteItems.module.css`** — Quote items
     - `.quote-empty-icon` and `.quote-empty p`: `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`

   - **`src/pages/cotizacion.astro`** — `.help-card p`: `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`
   - **`src/pages/cotizacion-enviada.astro`** — `.success-message` and `.step-content p`: `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`
   - **`src/pages/404.astro`** — `.error-message`: `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`
   - **`src/components/InstallPrompt.astro`** — `.install-text span` and `.install-btn.dismiss`: `#94a3b8` → `#b0bec5`

   **To Be Modified (Request 2 — planned, not yet implemented):**

   - **`src/components/islands/VariantSelector.module.css`** (855 lines) — The entire dark mode section (lines 673-807) has ~30 broken rules using inverted CSS variables. Key broken rules:
     - TEXT bugs: `.label` → `var(--color-gray-200)` = `#475569` (invisible), `.modelCardName` → `var(--color-gray-100)` = `#334155` (invisible), `.configTitle` → `var(--color-gray-200)` = `#475569`, `.cableLabel` → same, `.qtyInput color` → `var(--color-gray-100)` = `#334155`
     - BACKGROUND bugs: `.modelCard bg` → `var(--color-gray-800)` = `#f8fafc` (white!), `.barContainer bg` → same, `.qtyBtn bg` → `var(--color-gray-700)` = `#f1f5f9` (light!), `.barPill bg` → same
     - BORDER bugs: `.selectorHeading border` → `var(--color-gray-700)` = `#f1f5f9` (bright white border!), `.modelCard border` → `var(--color-gray-600)` = `#e2e8f0`, etc.

4. Errors and Fixes:
   - **FAQ dark mode text invisible:** `var(--color-gray-100)` in dark mode rule resolved to `#334155` (dark). Developer intended light text but the variable inverts. Fixed by replacing with hardcoded `#f1f5f9`.
   - **FAQ question text too dark:** `var(--color-gray-200)` → `#475569`. Fixed with `#e2e8f0`.
   - **faq.astro CTA box same bug:** `var(--color-gray-100)` for h3 text → `#334155`. Fixed with `#f1f5f9`.
   - **VariantSelector same pattern (not yet fixed):** ~30 rules use inverted variables causing invisible text, white backgrounds on dark theme, and bright white borders.
   - **User feedback:** After initial fixes, user said "aun hay problemas de colores, por ejemplo el varianteselector no se ve bien en dark mode" — indicating the VariantSelector was the next priority.

5. Problem Solving:
   - **Systematic `#94a3b8` audit:** Ran a grep across all `src/` for `#94a3b8` and categorized each instance (text that should be brightened vs SVG strokes to leave, vs footer text that's intentionally subdued, vs SKU/stock text that's intentionally muted). Changed ~20 instances of description/body text to `#b0bec5`, left muted indicators and SVGs unchanged.
   - **Icon contrast pattern:** Established a consistent dark mode icon pattern: `color: #60a5fa` with `background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(96, 165, 250, 0.12) 0%, rgba(96, 165, 250, 0.22) 100%)`. This matches the pattern already used in CategoryCard and index.astro trust icons.
   - **Root cause of VariantSelector bugs:** The CSS variable inversion system means that in `[data-theme="dark"]` rules, using `var(--color-gray-N)` gives the INVERTED value. Low numbers (50-200) become dark (for backgrounds), high numbers (700-900) become light (for text). The VariantSelector dark mode rules use them backwards.

6. All User Messages:

   - "aun hay problemas de colores, por ejemplo el varianteselector no se ve bien en dark mode" (accompanied by 3 screenshots: index CTA, nosotros founder section, BTT-001 product detail with VariantSelector)

Need to call ExitPlanMode, get approval, then implement by replacing the entire dark mode block (lines 673-807) in `src/components/islands/VariantSelector.module.css` with hardcoded hex values.
